project_descr: STAOP aims to support  strengthening governance and promoting transparency and accountability.

outputs.output_descr: The project aims to strengthen corruption prevention, transparency and accountability and provide support to both state institutions and civil society organizations to increase transparency and accountability in governance processes
Promoting inclusive recovery strategies that incorporate the needs of women, youth and minority groups.

document_name: Outcome 29 - Liberian governance system strengthened to Rule of Law: Liberia has an improved, to ensure consolidation of peace and stability supported by effective and well functioning institutions that foster inclusive participation of stakeholders espec

Outcome 30 -National reconciliation and social cohesion fostered within an enabling constitutional and legal environment supported by a strengthened and accountable justice and security institutions at national and local level.
